column4: hey, a little question. I want to install Ubuntu server and in the website it say it's supported till 2009. I suppose there will be new version until then and it'll be supported again, but the question is if i'll be able to update to  the new version remotly?
yeah if you can just wait till the end of next month and you will be able to use the new lts product
other wise you would have to reinstall or go through a messy string of upgrades since you cant skip versions while upgrading
